events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering as a Software Developer based on your resume.
A recruiter specialized in technical roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the process.
We completed an initial screening call to discuss your experience and motivation for the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt response and enthusiasm after the initial screening interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC with our senior development team.
You have successfully completed the technical interview showcasing your problem-solving and coding skills.
The HR interview is scheduled for May 13th at 10 AM to discuss cultural fit and company benefits.
Your HR interview went smoothly, and the team appreciated your insights about company culture and values.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation.
We have received your positive feedback regarding the job offer and are excited to move forward together.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are eager to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with introductions to the team and setup of development tools.
All hiring formalities are completed, and you are now officially part of our engineering department.
